text_en: Sign language is the language of deaf persons.
text_sw: Lugha ya ishara/alamani lugha ya watu wenye uziwi

text_en: Sign language is a combination of signs, gestures and facial expressions.
text_sw: Lugha ya ishara/alamani mchanganyiko wa ishara/alamakwa kutumia viungo vya mwili na maelezo yenye ujumbe ulioko usoni

text_en: In a deaf community deaf persons arenÂ´t impaired.
text_sw: Katika jamii ya watu wenye uziwi, uziwi siyo ulemavu.

text_en: There everybody will understand one another...
